add_entrypoint_object(
  mmap
  SRCS
    mmap.cpp
  HDRS
    ../mmap.h
  DEPENDS
    libc.include.sys_mman
    libc.include.sys_syscall
    libc.src.__support.OSUtil.osutil
    libc.src.errno.errno
)

add_entrypoint_object(
  munmap
  SRCS
    munmap.cpp
  HDRS
    ../munmap.h
  DEPENDS
    libc.include.sys_mman
    libc.include.sys_syscall
    libc.src.__support.OSUtil.osutil
    libc.src.errno.errno
)
